mdRecord.dcterms:description: This looks like a mimeograph copy of a letter to a "Member of School Board, Lexington Va." The typed signature indicates that it is from a Committee; the handwritten signature is John B. Thompson, Chairman. The subject of the letter is a defense of several teachers who signed a petition to have the principal removed at Lylburn Downing Public School.
Parts of this document have been redacted.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Committee to Member of School Board, May 28, 1930 (correspondence)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: African Americans -- Education
African American schools
African American teachers
Lylburn Downing School (Lexington, Va.)
Rowland, Amanda J.
